name: Floors (itch) (@Just_Jordan)
description:
Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Left Click -  Shoot (Every 3 Seconds

========================================================

Level 2: Shoot Tears. (It's not clear in game.)

========================================================

This is just a short 2 level demo of my game Floors. I'm just putting it here to

test the waters and get player feedback. This game will be updated frequently, and will get a full release that will be free to play in browser on itch.io and Newgrounds, if everything goes well.

If you have any bugs or suggestions, tell me in the comments below.

Thanks for playing.

=======================================================

Youtube: C.U.M Network (although its not for game design lol)

PS: A lot of things are temporary such as the free to use music.
